name: Library & Information Science
description: This Department was inducted to the Arts Faculty of Jadavpur University in the year 1964 and till 1984, it conducted only B. Lib. and Inf. Science Course of one-year duration from 1985 onwards, the Department started a full-time Masters Degree course and B. Lib & Inf. Science is offered as an evening course of 1.5 years duration. Head Of The Department: Dr. Sunil Kumar Chatterjee
